name: Town-Razer Tyrant
originalText:
Flying
When Town-Razer Tyrant enters the battlefield, target land you don't control loses all abilities except mana abilities and gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, this permanent deals 2 damage to you unless you sacrifice it."
text:
Flying
When Town-Razer Tyrant enters the battlefield, target nonbasic land you don't control loses all abilities except mana abilities and gains "At the beginning of your end step, this permanent deals 2 damage to you unless you sacrifice it."
